content: AMA First Investment Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 29 Jan 2019With a small capital to begin with, should I use dollar cost averaging for a few individual REITs or should i just use dollar cost averaging for 1 REIT ETF?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019I'll suggest avoiding the reit etf. Doesn't make sense to pay a management fees on top of sales charges and get a lower dividend yield as compared to choosing your own reit. Personally I'm doing dca into a mapletree reit on a monthly basis with a small amount6 comments2
